description: "Available in English Only." The Mix Master Blender is a fast and easy to use Drink Recipe App, providing an endless amount of possibilities for Drink Recipes, because not only are our Drinks stored on our remote server, but Drinks can easily be suggested and added to our server upon approval. You can search by drink name, search by liquor type and then ingredients, or just have the Mix Master Blender randomly choose your drink. If you like a drink, just add it to your personal favorite drink list. If you want to let your friends know what your drinking, you can update your facebook status with your current mixed drinks. Upon selecting a drink, a picture, ingredients, and recipe are provided to you.
